llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: productcatalogservice-deny-redis
  namespace: productcatalogservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: redis-cart
    ports:
    - port: 6379
      protocol: TCP
EOF
